text: Basic subjects are not well-taught, and there is a clear lack of academic rigor. The school also fails to provide proper learning resources, making it difficult for students to progress. For the fees they charge, I expected much better. If you are looking for a school that genuinely prioritizes your child’s education, I strongly suggest looking elsewhere.

I had high hopes for this school, but unfortunately, it has been a huge disappointment. The curriculum is poorly structured, and the teaching quality is far below expectations. Teachers seem unmotivated, and there is little effort in engaging students or ensuring they truly understand the lessons.

Auris Brick excels at promoting inclusivity and multiculturalism, fostering a respectful and diverse environment. Their commitment to integrating different cultures leads to innovation and new opportunities. This Tutorial School is highly recommended!
